title: How to get a response from a red or the community!
body:
Been trying to fix my LP or find out some information about it as I was told that my LP are tanked.
What dose this mean?
How did it happen?
How do I fix it?

Been posting for over month now and one thread got over 150 views and not one comment.
I've even help other players with their problems and a red don't even have the respect to reply to them.

replies.body: I had a look at your match history and you had a 7 loss streak. That person is likely referring to the massive drop in LP you experienced as a result of it (tanking). The only way to fix it my friend is to get back into Ranked and win it all back : )

That is the problem winning it back I only get 14LP for a win and when I lose, I lose 24LP.
So winning it all back is a bit harder than you would think.

Ah, that's because of the hidden rating called MMR (or Match Making Rating).

I found this decent explanation online. 

> Jim is Gold V. However, if Jim starts losing his MMR will drop past his current rank. If he were to lose 10 games in a row his MMR might go all the way down to Silver I MMR, which means after enough losses he would demote. Then, when he is in silver 1 his MMR will be low due to all the losses and he will start getting 10-15 LP per win instead of the 20-30 he would have been getting if he kept winning.

It just means that you will need to win a decent amount of games before your MMR gets back up and your gains/losses even out.

So riot is punishing me for playing while tilted ?
The way it is at the moment I have to get at least 70 - 80% win rate.
What is the benefit of doing this it just make it impossible for you to climb after having 10 bad games or even 10 good games you lost.

The system's been this way since the start. If you're doing well it rewards you with higher gain and lower losses, likewise doing poorly means lower gains and higher losses. The aim is to figure out which rank you belong. If you know you aren't playing to your rank and you keep losing the system thinks you shouldn't be there and makes it harder to get back. I know it sucks, and people hate to hear it, but it's easiest if you just take a step back and come back when you've got a fresh mind. It's as I always say (even though I don't always listen to myself on this) - you only punish yourself if you keep playing while tilted.

Im afraid i don't know what the problem is or what tanked means. But if your problem regards LP you can be fairly sure that you're not going to get a RIOT response. (they don't like to comment/deal with anything regarding the ranked system.)
